name: Hide and Seekrets
description:
Hide and Seekrets

A web browser multiplayer prop hunt game.

Game Structure:
  1. Enter your name and create or join a room and spawn in as a prop
  2. After an initial 45 second wait to allow others to join the room, the room will reset all props and choose the first hunter
  3. Hunters will have 5 minutes to find all props and shoot them to turn into more hunters. If all are found before the timer is up, the hunters win
  4. If there is at least one prop remaining by the time the match is over, then the hunter wins
Prop Controls:
  • Move with WASD or arrow keys
  • Jump with space bar
  • (After initial reset/first hunter pick) press F to change prop (limit of 2 changes)
Hunter Controls:
  • Move with WASD or arrow keys
  • Jump with space
  • Aim with mouse and shoot with left mouse button
